name: Color Squared
description:
Swipe to move the squares and combine them to earn points.
Merge squares of primary colors to create a new one with a secondary color. 
Merge two squares of opposite colors to remove them from the board and greatly increase your score.
Includes colorblind accessibility mode.

Make sure to pre-register for my next game "Infinitoggle" on Google Play

You can NOT redistribute this gameMake sure to check out some other free games here and don't forget to follow GG Undroid Games on Twitter

If you'd like to you can also support me here:
 

Thank you for playing!
